comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Newton Diehl Baker, Jr. (December 3, 1871 – December 25, 1937) was an American politician who belonged to the Democratic Party. He served as the 37th mayor of Cleveland, Ohio from 1912 to 1915 and as U.S. Secretary of War from 1916 to 1921." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newton_D._Baker

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: Thanks for tracking down the information on Baker. We will add more of his details to the record when we update.
